participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is introspective and thoughtful, often lost in his own world, but deeply values connections with those close to him.
participant_1.background: I enjoy rock music, especially Red Hot Chili Peppers. I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them. I listen to jazz and reminisce about my time in Paris. My family is my everything. we have a dog.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is adventurous and imaginative, with a love for storytelling and a curious spirit that drives her to explore new narratives.
participant_2.background: I am from a small town where the beach is my favorite place to relax and read. I loved to play make believe in the woods behind my house. i have a cheap car my dad gave me. i enjoy watching horror flicks. I love having my laptop with me wherever I go.

content.text: I like to read books and watch horror movies.
I love to read books too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read mystery novels and horror books.
I love mysteries! What are some of your favorite mystery novels?
I like the Agatha Christie books and the Nancy Drew books.
I love those books too! I also like the Sherlock Holmes books.
I have never read the Sherlock Holmes books. I should check them out.
You should! They are really good. What are some of your favorite horror movies?
I like the Saw movies and the Conjuring movies.
I have seen the Saw movies but not the Conjuring movies. I should check them out.
You should! They are really good. I also like the Insidious movies.
I have not seen those movies either. I will have to check them out.
You should! They are really good.
Thank you for the recommendations! I will have to check them out.
